articles.content:

articles.title: HS2 deal sees Britain get fastest trains in Europe with top speed of 225mph - Daily Mail
articles.description: The joint venture with Japanese company Hitachi and French partner Alstom will see a fleet of 54 high-speed trains built, in a deal which will support 2,500 jobs across Britain.
articles.content:
Britain will get 'Europe's fastest trains' - with a top speed of 225mph - after HS2 today signed a £2billion contract with manufacturers Hitachi and Alstom.

articles.title: New discovery by ESO scientists could change views about how planets are formed - Republic World
articles.description: In a first, scientists at the European Southern Observatory (ESO) have discovered a massive planet orbiting the biggest two-star system known to astronomers.
